attributes.additional_details: Because of the lawlessness with the UK today e.g.. acid attacks on children. Murders rife in major cities & terrorist attacks happening frequently. Being sent to prison for life is no deterrent to these fanatics so if they commit these offences then they themselves should be denied their lives.
attributes.background: Hold a referendum for the British people to decide on whether the death penalty should be reinstated for   serious crimes (child rape & murder) & terrorist acts
